DialogueText.Text: Oh hey! Finally, I was beginning to think it was just me and Chef alone here!
You know what the hell happened to everyone? Chef mentioned hearing something, but didn't elaborate...

Geez, that's really weird. Not even the Orator's around. He disappears to go do something or another on the occasion though. Maybe he and the rest of everybody are doing something? I know he'd been hyping everybody up recently...
Well, I do appreciate the break though. Haven't had to do a single bit of work! Guess I should just enjoy that, and not worry.

Oh my... I know the Orator certainly wasn't a fan of the Dragon Cult, and vice versa... I'd watch your back, and I certainly wouldn't go meddling with that Tablet again. I'm sure the Orator wouldn't hesitate to finish what he started if you did...
Oh geez... Sounds pretty spooky. Wait-
Why didn't he tell me any of that?! That stupid chef is gonna get it next time I see him!
